title: League Of Legends (TM) Client Popping up
body: Alright so one day when I was in game, my screen started to blink for no reason. So I went in practice mode to find out the problem. I tabbed out from the game to look for answers. Then suddenly the practice game I was in popped up by it self. There I noticed my game was popping up by it self exactly every minute, as if I had to pick a champion. Does anyone know a fix?

replies.body: It honestly sounds like a corrupt file may be causing issues with your client! Let's start by having you run a [clean reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040) of the client. From there go back into a custom game and see if the issue still persists.
